title: S2 E16: Surrendered
description:
After serving 99 days in jail, former mayor Kwame Kilpatrick walks free. He heads to Texas and tries to settle into a new life. But Detroit isn’t quite ready to let him go. 
For bonus content from this episode, visit crimetownshow.com. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:title: Surrendered
itunes:author: Gimlet
itunes:subtitle: After 99 days in jail, Kwame Kilpatrick gets a taste of freedom. But it won’t last long.
